name: CryptID (itch)
description:
A battle-style trading card game where players take turns summoning or boosting their cryptids. Players will attack and destroy their opponent's creatures until none are left to play. This game also intertwines AR usage throughout the game by having players scan their cards to see not only their cryptid's stats but also their lore and appearance.
